entry.title: 关于form-data处理
entry.content:
url = 'xxxxxxxxx'
headers = {
'Authorization': 'Bearer token',
'Content-Type': 'form-data'
}

files = {"name": (None, "one040701"), "parent_id": (None, "17751236"),
'owner_id': (None, "1775"), 'owner_info': (None, "yuanjj@163.com"),
'img': ('123.jpg', open(r'C:\123.jpg', 'rb'), 'image/png')
}
response = requests.post(url, headers=headers, files=files)
print(response.text)
